name: SNAKE!
description:
SNAKE! is a recreation of Snake for the Weekly Game Jam 50: Recreate a Classic.

Maneuver the snake with WSAD. Hitting the walls triggers a game over. With each green ball collected, you grow one block longer. I recommend choosing the fast speed option.

There is a bug where a green ball can spawn inside of a piece of your tail, but you can collect it if you move the tail out of it.

My first game! ｡^‿^｡
